title: Bug 109718 - Tips in text item displayed in one line instead of expected format
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item
Expected Result: tips shows in given format
Actual Result: tips shows in one line
OB: When a large content is put in a text item, the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Put a large content in a text item.
3. Save the content.
4. Put the mouse on the text item.

Expected Result: The tips should be displayed in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips are displayed in one line.
